sentence.Network_en: He lost his balance, and pitched out of the window headfirst.
sentence.Network_cn: 他失去平衡, 头朝下从窗子上跌了下去.

sentence.Network_en: My mate dived headfirst through a window and I ran down the hallway.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的同伴从窗口一头扎了下去，而我则沿着走廊跑。

sentence.Network_en: Dive: To plunge, especially headfirst into water.
sentence.Network_cn: 跳水: 潜入水中, 尤指头先下水的跳水.

entry.def: If you move head-first in a particular direction, your head is the part of your body that is furthest forward as you are moving.

example.ex: He had apparently fallen head-first down the stairwell...
